metadata.title: CVE-2024-50174 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/panthor: Fix race when converting group handle to group objectXArray provides it's own internal lock which protects the internal arraywhen entries are being simultaneously added and removed. However thereis still a race between retrieving the pointer from the XArray andincrementing the reference count.To avoid this race simply hold the internal XArray lock whenincrementing the reference count, this ensures there cannot be a racingcall to xa_erase().
